data.prayer: Spirit, help the 13,705 believers in Theni to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Theni, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Theni, Tamil Nadu, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary: On average, 101 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Theni, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Theni.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Theni to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mukkuvan (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, cause the 13,705 believers in Theni to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Theni, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Theni, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,245,900.

We estimate Theni has 13,705 people who might know Jesus, 15,117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,217,078 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Theni, Tamil Nadu, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
